node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `nodetype` ( `nodetype_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `readers_user` int DEFAULT '0', `writers_user` int DEFAULT '0', `deleters_user` int DEFAULT '0', `restrict_nodetype` int DEFAULT '0', `extends_nodetype` int DEFAULT '0', `restrictdupes` int DEFAULT '0', `sqltable` char(255) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `grouptable` char(40) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `typeVersioned` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `verify_edits` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`nodetype_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: nodetype
